title: i need to clean up my storage from the device images but i cannot look up the location
content: im trying to clean up my device storage since its going to full, i want to delete my photos in the devices but im not sure how to do it, either it s hidden or what. do i need to delete in the google photos or what? i have connected my device to the laptop but then there is no folder showing the images that has cost me about 85GB, where i can delete all those images? where to look the location of the images in the device.
